text: Lang Suan () is a town (thesaban mueang) in southern Thailand. As of 2006 it had a population of 11,822 and includes the entire sub-district (tambon) Lang Suan and parts of Khan Ngoen, Pho Daeng, Laem Sai, and Wang Tako, all within Lang Suan District.Department of Provincial Administration ==History== The township (thesaban tambon) Lang Suan was upgraded to town status on 20 February 2004. ==References== ==External links== * *http://www.langsuancity.go.th Category:Populated places in Chumphon Province
title: Lang Suan (town)
